subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cliff Robinson will sign a two-year deal, and will miss the first two games of the season, ending his five-game ban for a violation of the N.B.A.’s antidrug program.
snippet: Cliff Robinson will sign a two-year deal, and will miss the first two games of the season, ending his five-game ban for a violation of the N.B.A.’s antidrug program.
